full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` NE GSER JO BO CHEN PO LA BRTEN PA'I TSOGS MCHOD DAM CAN DGYES PAR BYED PA'I GLU DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES NE GSER JO BO CHEN PO LA BRTEN PA'I MCHOD PA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA, MTHUN MONG MA YIN PA 'DI NI, LHA 'DI DANG 'DRI CHEN POR YOD PA'I SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA DNGOS GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYA BAS BRIS PA LA, SLAR YANG GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES ZHES BYA BAS, RA BSGRENG PHYOGS KYI 'BROG BTZUN RKAN PO ZHIG GI BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS DAG BYAS TE PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO tA LAR SBYAR BA NI ZOG DANG BTZUN GYI SLAR MA 'DRES PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
